title: Family day care
creator_credit: Karl McPhee, Robin Hughes and Film Australia
brief_description: Additional credits are: script- Karl McPhee; photographer- John Hosking; editor- Karl Sodersten; sound- Max Hensser, Julian Ellingworth. Pam Goodwin is one of the co-ordinators of a Family Day Care Program. Her job entails interviewing parents and helping them find the kind of care that they want for their children, and interviewing the women who want to mind children and helping them in this role.
